2015.milotic.bundle.2: Aqua Swirl with the Milotic Bundle!
2015.milotic.bundle.3: Milotic’s Sparkling Ripples Ability lets you retrieve a card from the discard pile, and its Aqua Swirl attack does damage and switches out the opposing Pokémon! Add a booster pack, card sleeves, and a deck box, and your deck is ready to sail!
2015.milotic.bundle.4: This bundle contains: Matching deck box and card sleeves inspired by Milotic 1 Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough booster pack (10-card) 1 Milotic Pokémon card (XY—Primal Clash, 44/160) These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through May 16, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.malamar.bundle.3: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs from the XY—Ancient Origins expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Malamar, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection!
2017.malamar.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 foil Malamar Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY58) 3 Pokémon TCG: XY—Ancient Origins booster packs (10-card) 1 coin These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through May 23, 2017.
com.direwolfdigital.deck.core.toomanydup: You have too many copies of a card in your deck. Please revise your deck and try again.

playmat.prompt.fewercardsattack: Are you sure you want to do this? Using this attack will result in having fewer cards in your hand.

specialvisualizations.dealdamagewhendama: If this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, it will put damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.
specialvisualizations.metaldealsincrease: This player's {M} Pokémon's attacks do more damage to the opponent's Active Pokémon.
